member.name: T:Logic.IGameLogic`1
member.summary: The interface for the game logic.
member.typeparam: A type of object the logic deals with.

member.name: E:Logic.IGameLogic`1.ScreenUpdate
member.summary: Refreshes the screen to draw the map around the player.

member.name: E:Logic.IGameLogic`1.ObjectHit
member.summary: Triggers when an object is hit by either a player or a monster.

member.name: E:Logic.IGameLogic`1.HealthUpdate
member.summary: Triggers when any object's health points change.

member.name: E:Logic.IGameLogic`1.ObjectFalling
member.summary: Triggers when there is no ground under a player/monster.
